name: Mr. Svengoolie's Exotic and Diverse Collection of Vocabulary and Terms Hangman
name_original: Mr. Svengoolie's Exotic and Diverse Collection of Vocabulary and Terms Hangman
description: Sometimes its nicer to recreate what has already been done to your own style. I'm also just tired of the feigned happy attitudes of some of my teachers, so I felt like doing parody of that always positive classroom feeling with a complete opposite, oppressive, atmosphere.
